過去のことを後悔し続けても
何の解決にも ならないしね
google_translated:
Even if you regret about the past
I will not be him for any solution

en_text: You're right.
jp_text: そう… ですよね

en_text: So, have you held hands yet?
jp_text: ねえ  もう手ぐらいつないだ？

en_text: W-We're just friends!
jp_text:
（長谷）
た… ただの友達ですから！
google_translated: ... because it is just a friend!

en_text: Well then.
jp_text: さてと…

en_text: Kaori's probably hungry.
jp_text:
香織 お腹すかせてると
思うから

en_text: Thank you for today.
jp_text: 今日は どうもありがとう

en_text: What can I do?
jp_text: 俺に できること…

en_text: I hope Hase-kun's make-up test went well.
jp_text:
休み時間にテストの復習しようって
言ってたんだけど…
google_translated:
Let's review the test at a holiday time
I was saying ...

en_text: Today, Saki-chan and Hase-kun said they \Nwanted to study during lunch, but...
jp_text:
今日もね
沙希ちゃんと長谷君がね

en_text: How'd it go yesterday?
jp_text: なあ どうだった？ 昨日

en_text: Kaori-chan, good morning.
jp_text: （山岸）香織ちゃん おはよう

en_text: Good morning.
jp_text: おはよう

en_text: It's okay if I talk to you in class now, right?
jp_text:
もう いいよね？
教室でも話しかけて
google_translated:
It's good, right?
Talking in the classroom

en_text: I should thank you, too.
jp_text:
藤宮さんのおかげだよ
ありがとう

en_text: When you said "good morning" \Nin front of everyone, I was surprised...
jp_text:
“おはよう”って言われて
びっくりしたけど…

en_text: There's one more thing.
jp_text: もう１つあるんだ

en_text: Whenever I read my diary, there's one thing written down under every Monday.
jp_text:
毎週 月曜日に
必ず入ってる言葉があるの
google_translated:
Every Monday
There is a word that is always included

en_text: What do you think it is?
jp_text: あっ うーん… 何だろう？

en_text: "I'd like for us to be friends again."
jp_text:
“また 俺と
友達になってください”
google_translated:
"Also with me
Please become a Friend"

en_text: Hey, Hase-kun...
jp_text: ねえ 長谷君

en_text: Would it be okay if I looked forward to \Nhearing those words again next week?
jp_text:
来週も その言葉を
楽しみにしててもいいですか？
google_translated:
Next week also the words
May I look forward to it?

en_text: Of course.
jp_text: もちろん

en_text: I learned something about her past, \Nbut I still don't understand anything.
jp_text:
過去のことは 少し分かったようで
やっぱり分からないし
google_translated:
It seems that the past was a little
After all I do not understand

en_text: But if it'll bring a smile back to her face,
jp_text:
面倒だと感じてしまうことも
あるけれど―
google_translated:
It is also possible to feel troublesome
Though there is

en_text: I'll summon the courage \Nto become Fujimiya-san's friend...
jp_text:
藤宮さんと
友達になろうと思ったんだ
google_translated:
Mr. Fujimiya
I thought I would be a friend

en_text: and again.
jp_text: 何度でも
